ygData.subject: Re: L 11 song and L21+ sites?
ygData.msgSnippet: The information I have says that the level 11 song is Cinda s Charismatic Carrillion which is available in the Kelethin branch of the bard s guild (NO pun
ygData.messageBody:
The information I have says that the level 11 song is Cinda's Charismatic
Carrillion which is available in the Kelethin branch of the bard's guild (NO
pun intended....) The song raises your faction with NPC's (Great for
completing all those quests and dealing with merchants!) It is a song that
uses wind instruments and targets yourself only.

On another note, my guldmistress gave me permission to join the 9th rank. I
am unable to locate the next song in my guild. Can someone be so kind as to
point me to a spot to be able to learn Elemental Rhythms?

Thanks,
Lulen
9th Rank, Kelethin
Solusek Ro

----- Original Message -----
From: Dan Harmon <deharmon@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, June 14, 1999 09:29
Subject: [eqbards] L 11 song and L21+ sites?


> From: "Dan Harmon" <deharmon@...>
>
> I've checked a couple of decent sources, and they disagree on what the lvl
> 11 song is. I think EQVault says it's one thing, but it's broken.
>
> Could someone set me straight, please (and if you know where to find it,
> that'd be great, too :) )?
>
> Secondly, even though it'll probably be months before I get to lvl 21 (I
> enjoy my cleric and mage too, but bard most of all), where can I find the
> higher level songs? Are there any high level bard web sites?
>
> Thanks!
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Have you entered ONElist's "Grow to Give" program?
> http://www.onelist.com
> Deadline is June 19. Join now to win $5000 for your charity of choice.
